TextView.android:text: Explain what all there is to do and how it can make a difference and then below have the specific sections

Donating time or money to MeToo is allowing these organizations to gain the resources to allow survivors to share their stories without fear. Here are some nonprofits that are looking for helpers and donations.
Me Too is a movement that helps women find ways to heal from experiences of sexual assault - \nhttps://metoomvmt.org/donate/
National Sexual Violence Resource Center is a non-profit organization that attempts to prevent and attend to sexual violence - https://www.nsvrc.org/donate
Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network (RAINN) is an anti-sexual assault organization that helps survivors, educates society, and improves public policy. - \nhttps://www.rainn.org/donate
End Rape On Campus (EROC) is an organization that focuses on sexual assault prevention throughout college campuses. - https://endrapeoncampus.org/our-team-1/
Time’s Up works towards ending sexual harassment, assault and discrimination in the workplace - \nhttps://timesupnow.org/

Petitions are a great way to show your support for important movements, including the MeToo movement. By signing some of the petitions below, you are becoming part of a team that is aimed to make a change for all women in the world. Here are some links to sign below.

When someone experiences a traumatic event like sexual assault it is very difficult for that person to ever fully recover and gain the courage to stand up for themselves. The Me Too movement exemplified how society instils a fear in survivors that keeps them from sharing their stories. We must stand in solidarity with these victims to provide them the strength to rise up and face their perpetrators. When there is a protest or march or rally people must show up and prove to the oppressors that think they got away with their horrendous actions that there are consequences for horrible, disgusting behavior that ruins someone else’s life. It is time for change and it is time to put an end to the suffering of many women across the world. If change is created now then future generations of women and girls will not have to live in fear of being sexually assaulted in their lifetime.

99.5% of rapists get away with their crime. Our justice system is continually failing victims of sexual assault everyday. Many people shy away from reporting their abuse because of statistics like the ones above. They do not believe or trust that justice will be served even if they report their harasser. This is the biggest reason why people must vote officials and others into power that they trust will make a change happen. Letting 99% of people that commit a crime walk free should be a crime in itself. So many women have to face their abuser everyday and for the rest of their lives because justice was not served. Please pressure your local officials to take this issue more seriously and only vote for the ones that truly believe in changing things. Vote for a President that does not have sexual harassment or assualt cases against him. Make sure the policy at your workplace is safe and does not protect the abuser more than it helps the victim. Use your power to help the many people that feel powerless after the traumatic experience they have been through.
